text: when available) Abnormality of metabolism/homeostasis 90% Cerebral cortical atrophy 90% Cognitive impairment 90% Hypertonia 90% Microcephaly 90% Holoprosencephaly 50% The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database.
